name: Count-Down
description:
It’s an average day at work, the station generator is unstable and going to explode, a hostile alien infestation is spreading everywhere, but worst of all the coffee machine is out.

One problem at a time, coffee machine first.

However, coffee machines need power and if you can’t boot the auxiliary generators in time and stabilize the main reactor, the entire station will detonate and then you won’t be getting that coffee. So generators first.

Incase you forget:

WASD for movement
Shift for dodge
Left mouse for Shoot
Q for switch weapons
E for basically everything else

LD Page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/count-down
